actionConfiguration.body:
-- getProductsWithStock - Updated Products with stock validation and pagination
SELECT 
  p.product_id AS id,
  p.name AS name,
  p.category AS category,
  p.description AS description,
  p.warehouse_location AS location,
  p.price AS price,
  p.sku AS sku,
  p.total_stock AS total_stock
FROM 
  db_products p
ORDER BY 
  p.product_id
LIMIT {{tbl_products.pageSize}} OFFSET {{(tbl_products.pageNo - 1) * tbl_products.pageSize}};
